system.description: When you enter into a charged situation, roll+hot.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, your enemies identify you immediately as their foremost threat.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value:
On a 7–9, hold 1.

Spend your hold 1 for 1 to make eye contact with an NPC present, who freezes or flinches and can’t take action until you break it off.

success.label: Success
success.value:
On a 10+, hold 2.

Spend your hold 1 for 1 to make eye contact with an NPC present, who freezes or flinches and can’t take action until you break it off.
